titles.title: Satellite Consumers' Access to Public Television Digital Programming Act of 2009
To mandate satellite carriage of qualified noncommercial educational television stations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications, Technology, and the Internet.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 2/24/2009--Introduced. Satellite Consumers' Access to Public Television Digital Programming Act of 2009 - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to require a satellite carrier that offers multichannel video programming distribution service to over five million subscribers to retransmit the digital signals of each noncommercial educational television station that is located in any local U.S. market.
